citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
In the morning of November 8th, 2023, a sheep did not receive a dose of post-operative medication as described in the
IACUC approved protocol. A deviation from post-operative care described in the protocol has the potential to impact the
health and wellbeing of study animals and constitutes a significant change to approved activity that did not undergo
IACUC review and approval. Significant changes to ongoing activities must be reviewed and approved by the IACUC
before they are implemented.
The missed dose was identified and administered by veterinary staff during routine clinical review later that morning. This
was voluntarily reported to USDA and corrective measures had been implemented prior to inspection. To remain
corrected after September 4th, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
